001package org.consensusj.namecoin.jsonrpc.core;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.LegacyAddress;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Monetary;
006import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
007import org.bitcoinj.base.SegwitAddress;
008
009import java.util.ArrayList;
010import java.util.Arrays;
011import java.util.Collections;
012import java.util.HashMap;
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.Locale;
015import java.util.Map;
016import java.util.Optional;
017import java.util.stream.Stream;
018
019import static org.bitcoinj.base.Coin.COIN;
020
021/**
022 *
023 */
024public enum NameCoinNetwork implements Network {
025    MAINNET("org.namecoin.mainnet"),
026    TESTNET("org.namecoin.testnet"),
027    SIGNET("org.namecoin.signet"),
028    REGTEST("org.namecoin.regtest");
029
030    /**
031     * Scheme part for Bitcoin URIs.
032     */
033    public static final String BITCOIN_SCHEME = "bitcoin";
034
035    /**
036     * The maximum number of coins to be generated
037     */
038    private static final long MAX_COINS = 21_000_000;
039
040    /**
041     * The maximum money to be generated
042     */
043    public static final Coin MAX_MONEY = COIN.multiply(MAX_COINS);
044
045    /** The ID string for the main, production network where people trade things. */
046    public static final String ID_MAINNET = MAINNET.id();
047    /** The ID string for the testnet. */
048    public static final String ID_TESTNET = TESTNET.id();
049    /** The ID string for the signet. */
050    public static final String ID_SIGNET = SIGNET.id();
051    /** The ID string for regtest mode. */
052    public static final String ID_REGTEST = REGTEST.id();
053    /** The ID string for the Unit test network -- there is no corresponding {@code enum}. */
054    public static final String ID_UNITTESTNET = "org.bitcoinj.unittest";
055
056    private final String id;
057
058    // All supported names for this BitcoinNetwork
059    private final List<String> allNames;
060
061    // Maps from names and alternateNames to BitcoinNetwork
062    private static final Map<String, NameCoinNetwork> stringToEnum = mergedNameMap();
063
064    NameCoinNetwork(String networkId, String... alternateNames) {
065        this.id = networkId;
066        this.allNames = combine(this.toString(), alternateNames);
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Return the canonical, lowercase, user-facing {@code String} for an {@code enum}
071     * @return canonical lowercase value
072     */
073    @Override
074    public String toString() {
075        return name().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * Return the network ID string (previously specified in {@code NetworkParameters})
080     *
081     * @return The network ID string
082     */
083    @Override
084    public String id() {
085        return id;
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * Header byte of base58 encoded legacy P2PKH addresses for this network.
090     * @return header byte as an {@code int}.
091     * @see LegacyAddress.AddressHeader
092     */
093    public int legacyAddressHeader() {
094        //return LegacyAddress.AddressHeader.ofNetwork(this).headerByte();
095        return 52;
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Header byte of base58 encoded legacy P2SH addresses for this network.
100     * @return header byte as an {@code int}.
101     * @see LegacyAddress.P2SHHeader
102     */
103    public int legacyP2SHHeader() {
104        //return LegacyAddress.P2SHHeader.ofNetwork(this).headerByte();
105        return 5;
106    }
107
108    /**
109     * Return the standard Bech32 {@link org.bitcoinj.base.SegwitAddress.SegwitHrp} (as a {@code String}) for
110     * this network.
111     * @return The HRP as a (lowercase) string.
112     */
113    public String segwitAddressHrp() {
114        //return LegacyAddress.P2SHHeader.ofNetwork(this).headerByte();
115        return "??";
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * The URI scheme for Bitcoin.
120     * @see <a href="https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0021.mediawiki">BIP 0021</a>
121     * @return string containing the URI scheme
122     */
123    @Override
124    public String uriScheme() {
125        return BITCOIN_SCHEME;
126    }
127
128    @Override
129    public boolean hasMaxMoney() {
130        return true;
131    }
132
133    @Override
134    public Coin maxMoney() {
135        return MAX_MONEY;
136    }
137
138    @Override
139    public boolean exceedsMaxMoney(Monetary amount) {
140        if (amount instanceof Coin) {
141            return ((Coin) amount).compareTo(MAX_MONEY) > 0;
142        } else {
143            throw new IllegalArgumentException("amount must be a Coin type");
144        }
145    }
146
147    /**
148     * Find the {@code BitcoinNetwork} from a name string, e.g. "mainnet", "testnet" or "signet".
149     * A number of common alternate names are allowed too, e.g. "main" or "prod".
150     * @param nameString A name string
151     * @return An {@code Optional} containing the matching enum or empty
152     */
153    public static Optional<NameCoinNetwork> fromString(String nameString) {
154        return Optional.ofNullable(stringToEnum.get(nameString));
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * Find the {@code BitcoinNetwork} from an ID String
159     * <p>
160     * Note: {@link #ID_UNITTESTNET} is not supported as an enum
161     * @param idString specifies the network
162     * @return An {@code Optional} containing the matching enum or empty
163     */
164    public static Optional<NameCoinNetwork> fromIdString(String idString) {
165        return Arrays.stream(values())
166                .filter(n -> n.id.equals(idString))
167                .findFirst();
168    }
169
170    // Create a Map that maps name Strings to networks for all instances
171    private static Map<String, NameCoinNetwork> mergedNameMap() {
172        return Stream.of(values())
173                .collect(HashMap::new,                  // Supply HashMaps as mutable containers
174                        NameCoinNetwork::accumulateNames,    // Accumulate one network into hashmap
175                        Map::putAll);                       // Combine two containers
176    }
177
178    // Add allNames for this Network as keys to a map that can be used to find it
179    private static void accumulateNames(Map<String, NameCoinNetwork> map, NameCoinNetwork net) {
180        net.allNames.forEach(name -> map.put(name, net));
181    }
182
183    // Combine a String and an array of String and return as an unmodifiable list
184    private static List<String> combine(String canonical, String[] alternateNames) {
185        List<String> temp = new ArrayList<>();
186        temp.add(canonical);
187        temp.addAll(Arrays.asList(alternateNames));
188        return Collections.unmodifiableList(temp);
189    }
190
191}
